statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback_ratings WHERE id = 1 AND customer_id = 100
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating = 5 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_rating > 3;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM ratings WHERE feedback_comment LIKE '%good%');
DELETE FROM ProductFeedback WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM ProductFeedback WHERE rating < 3 AND comment LIKE '%improve%';
DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE customer_id = 100 AND rating = 5;
DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE feedback_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE customer_id = 200 AND rating = 5;
